ImageData.LabelName: Table 1. Pretest Risk for Relatives to Carry the Mutant RB1 Allele of the Proband
Relative of Proband Pretest Risk for Mutant Allele (%)

Pretest risk for RB1 mutation in family members of an affected child with retinoblastoma. Risk for RB1 mutant allele is shown as a percentage for unilateral and bilateral probands without family history of retinoblastoma.

*Third- and fourth-degree relatives of unilateral probands have calculated risks of 0.003% and 0.001%, respectively, which are less than the normal population risk of 0.007% (1 in 15 000 live births); therefore, the risk is stated at 0.007%.
